content: Morning Rohan - VO‚ÇÇ Max test is confirmed for 8:00 at Singapore Sports Institute. Sarah has your slot and check-in instructions.
On my way. Should be quick, right?
About 30 mins total. You'll get real-time feedback during the session.
Test complete. The technician said you gave a solid effort. Results will be uploaded by this afternoon.
Felt tougher than expected. Curious to see the numbers.

Rohan - here's your baseline summary: ApoB mildly elevated; VO‚ÇÇ Max is 42 (above average for age). BP and inflammation markers are good. Focus areas: lipid optimization and slightly better aerobic conditioning.
Clear. Let's see if VO‚ÇÇ can be nudged up without adding huge time blocks.
Agreed. We'll work those in with minimal disruption.
Got 5 nights of Oura data - avg HRV 45 ms, sleep latency ~28 mins. Goal for next 90 days: HRV up to 55+, latency under 20 mins.
Interesting‚Ä¶ I didn't realise latency was that long. Feels shorter.
Common. You're probably drifting but not yet in deep sleep. We'll tackle it.
Rohan - easy quick win: Magnesium glycinate, 300-400 mg, 30 mins before bed. Can reduce latency and improve deep sleep. Safe for travel use.
Sounds simple. I'll try it.
I'll have Sarah stock your travel kit with it before Seoul.
Hi Rohan. I lead your movement pillar. After Seoul, can we do a short virtual to check your form on a few key exercises?
Sure. Keep it short though. Mornings are best.
Hey Ruby, just got my travel extened to Sunday. Clashes with the DEXA scan. Can you shift it?
No problem. I'll handle it with Sarah and send you a new slot.
DEXA moved to 22nd July, 11:00 AM. Fits between your calls that day.
Perfect. Thanks for sorting that so fast.
Also, your Seoul plan's ready. Rachel adapted it for the hotel gym and limited time slots.
Got it. I'll review on the flight.
Safe travels today. I've sent the portable kit and supplement pack to your office for pickup.
Thanks Ruby - boarding now. Will test the magnesium tonight.
(Seoul time) Took the magnesium - feel calmer already.
Great to hear! Watch Oura's latency score over the week. Let's see if it trends down.
Will do. Hotel gym's small but functional.
Rachel's plan should fit perfectly there. Focus on consistency over volume while traveling.
Two nights with magnesium - latency dropped to 18 mins, HRV nudged to 47 ms. Early but promising.
Nice. That's faster than I expected.
Yep. small tweaks, measurable results. Exactly what we want.
All set for your return Sunday? I'll have Monday morning blocked for admin catch-up.
Yes, landing late Sunday. Monday 9 works.
When you're back, we'll lock that 15-min movement baseline call. I'll work with Sarah on timing.
Alright. Let's aim for mid-week or after the DEXA scan?
Confirmed with Sarah - we'll schedule your movement baseline call after the DEXA scan.
Week recap: VO‚ÇÇ and baseline complete, magnesium trial successful, DEXA rescheduled. Nice progress despite travel üëç
Feels productive. Appreciate how smooth everything's been.
That's the goal! Glad to hear it!
